examples: The full stop at the end of this sentence is a dot.

definitions.definition: the spoken form of a full stop in an internet or email address, or some computer files:
examples: "What's the web address?" "www dot cambridge dot org".

definitions.definition: the short sounds or short flashes of light used with dashes when sending messages in Morse (code)
to put a dot or dots on something:
examples: Your handwriting is hard to read because you don't dot your i's.

definitions.definition: to be spread across an area, or to spread many similar things across an area:
examples: We have offices dotted around/all over the region.
